original_text: And the name of his house shall be called in Israel, ‘The house of him who had his sandal pulled off.’
korean_text: 이스라엘 중에서 그의 이름을 신 벗김 받은 자의 집이라 부를 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And the name of his house shall be called in Israel,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 집의 이름은 이스라엘에서 불리게 될 것이니,

sentences.original_text: who had his sandal pulled off.’
sentences.korean_translation: 신발이 벗겨진 자의 집이라 할 것이라.’
